name: Yie Ar Kung-Fu
summary: Yie Ar Kung-Fu is a 1985 fighting game developed and published by Konami. Along with 1984's Karate Champ, which influenced Yie-Ar Kung Fu, it is one of the games that established the basis for modern fighting games.

name: Yin Yuh
summary: A Japanese arcade style game based on a cookie-loving spirit named Yin Yuh. Jump, drop, stomp, and throw orbs at your enemies through 20 levels. If that's too easy, try is on Hard mode and Insane mode!

name: Yixin
summary: The first love simulator, the real immersive real-life love game, the video novel type, the only pure love experience, takes you into the pure and beautiful love world that seems like dreams, and feels the emotion that has been buried in your heart for a long time.

name: Yindy
summary: A non-linear horror game: carry items, solve puzzles, enjoy the music, explore unique atmospheres in each map, and savor your time walking through a mysterious, dark, and intriguing world...

name: Yin Peach Blossom
summary:
I saw a girl with light blue hair by the lake, and she actually wants to add me on WeChat?!

Wait, I woke up, it was just a dream.

Huh? I dreamed about her again today?

name: Yin Yang
summary: Use negative space to help our duo to solve the puzzles and reach the exit.

name: Yin-Yang Labyrinth
summary: "Yin-Yang Labyrinth" is a Chinese-style multiplayer online Roguelike dungeon crawler game. One step to life, one step to death. Mysterious and deadly labyrinths. You and your companions find yourselves trapped in a bizarre maze. You must work together to overcome challenges and escape the labyrinth.

name: YIIK: I.V
summary: YIIK I.V (1.5) is a free update which is serves as the definitive edition of YIIK: A Postmodern RPG, originally released in 2019. An unusual error manifests on April 4th, a day that echoes the enigmatic code 404. In a desperate act of innocence, a child relinquishes her name for an invitation to a birthday party, her hope tethered to the faint possibility of finding her brother. Meanwhile, Alex, a recent college graduate, returns home, only to find his reality unspooling like a threadbare tapestry. Guided by a cat which slips through the very fabric of his mind, Alex descends into the depths of his consciousness where he witnesses the impossible: a woman, locked away in an iron maiden, vanishing into thin air. A vision which ignites an undying obsession and threatens to unravel the boundaries of his world.

name: YinYang Street
summary: Set in a small town on the border in the 1980s, "Street" is led by Li Minglai, an active soldier engaged in a homeland defense war. A trip back home in the usual but, Once warm and happy home is now only a mystery, everything points to a mysterious and weird legend - "Yin and Yang street".

name: YIIK: A Postmodern RPG
summary: YIIK is a colourful 3D Japanese-Style RPG set in the 1990s and based around a mystery in a small town. Recent college graduate Alex Eggleston gathers weirdos from the internet to investigate the mystery around Sammy Pak, a mysterious woman who goes missing in a supernatural event. The player can control the characters in turn based battles where normal everyday objects are used as weapons. The combat consists of turn based moves with timing based actions which can increase the damage of an attack. There are six dungeons to explore which include battles, puzzles which have to be solved, and traps that have to be avoided. There are approximately twenty five hours of gameplay.

name: Yi Xian: The Cultivation Card Game
summary: "Yixian" is an online card deck building game with a background of cultivating immortals. Every game is a deck building experience from scratch. Players will start to practice from the Qi refining period, gradually break through the realm, and obtain stronger cards. By changing cards, the deck will continue to grow and become stronger, with a powerful combination of routines, and finally defeat all opponents to win.

name: Yin-Yang Ping-Pong
summary: Something to look at.

name: Yippee Skater
summary: Play as the Autism Creature on a skate board in an endless skater. Now with 45% more autism!

name: Yippy Cube
summary: Yippy Cube is a happy party game. You will incarnate cute animals, place and eliminate cubes falling from the sky with your friends in various interesting stages. Whether working together to achieve the goals or PK with other teams, you will have constant joy and fun.

name: YiYi
summary: You are "GUI", you have come to a city of eternal night, to find your soul to dream of "Yi Yi".

name: Yingzinue: Donghei
summary: Yinznüe: donhei (original project code: the rest of life) is a round role-playing game independently developed by the independent game author Dai frog, with the revival of Hanfu as the main theme.

name: Yin Yang
summary: It is a minimalist puzzle game in which you have to join the two opposing forces in the universe: Yin and Yang.

name: Yinyang
summary: Yinyang is a simple arcade game of rolling a ball. Roll off a tile and it will flip over and vanish. Make them all vanish and the exit will open, so the trick is to roll along every tile without doubling back.

name: Yihongyuan
summary: Can I float in life without becoming trapped in the mire of the dirt ,is myconfidence. Charm them with your personal charm.

name: Yin-Yang Ping-Pong: Supporter Pack
summary: A supporters pack for Yin-Yang Ping-Pong. Adds the ability to randomize the colors.

name: Yissa Deep Realms
summary: Hardcore action platformer with multiple endings that depend on your choices.

name: Yie Ar Kung-Fu
summary: Game Boy port of Yie Ar Kung-Fu.

name: YieldTrillions
summary: Hello, I'm a corn alien, I need to start the ship and go home, please V I have 10000000000 pounds of corn for spaceship fuel and I'll give you half a pound of popcorn as a reward when I get home.

name: Yin and Yang
summary:
A game inspired by duality

This one was weird.

Whenever I come up with a concept for a mechanic I always draw two blocks with a gap in-between. Then I draw interesting ways to get from point A to point B. But for this concept I didn’t draw any kind of line. I just folded the paper to get the blocks on top of each other. Which instantly I thought “Well, that’s interesting.”

I was going through this kind of mental block when coming up with ideas for a while. Then Yin and Yang is kind of this small break through. It feels so out of the box that I don’t really understand it either.

name: Yi and the Thousand Moons
summary: A short video game musical.

name: Yip Quest
summary: Fantasy comedy point and click game where you have to play three kobolds who have to steal some treasury.

name: Yie Ar Kung-Fu 2: The Emperor Yie-Gah
summary: The new version of Yie Ar Kung Fu!! Even more thrills and suspense!

name: YiShi
summary: A squad-based game where the player takes the role of a healer in a Whac-A-Mole attempt to keep the squad alive through healing, enchantment, and offensive spells to vanquish hordes of green skins.

name: Yiki Action RPG
summary: Yiki Action RPG is a game based on a world with an "anime" style and a Sandbox theme.

name: Yin Yang Space
summary: A sandbox FPS game, you can build gardens in the most intuitive and simple way and play with robots.

name: Yield! Fall of Rome
summary: Forge your Kingdom amidst the Ruins of Rome! As the world crumbles, rebuild civilization and shape your destiny with every decision. Unleash your strategic prowess, conquer provinces, and explore dynamically generated campaigns that promise endless challenges!
